original_text: Yes, I went and had the tacos. YES, the lengua tacos. YES, I KNOW!!! They were good. Nope, pretty sure they've got it all. Oh, if you buy a plantain that is pitch-black, or you find that your plantains at [[home]] have gone pitch-black, simply slice them open, place in oven, bake until warm and tender, then spread with guava paste (available at Reyna Foods). So the man at the counter tells me. True story.
